scripts.check: pnpm -r run typecheck && pnpm run lint
scripts.release:test: pnpm --filter backend run test && pnpm --filter frontend run test
scripts.release:sync: CURRENT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` && git checkout --quiet main && git pull --quiet && git checkout --quiet develop && git pull --quiet && git checkout --quiet $CURRENT_BRANCH
scripts.release:commit: git add package.json pnpm-lock.yaml packages/*/package.json && git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "Bumped to $npm_package_version" --no-verify
scripts.release:pr: gh pr create --base main --head release/$npm_package_version --title "Merge release/$npm_package_version into main" --body "Release version $npm_package_version"
scripts.release:sync-develop: git checkout develop && git pull && git merge release/$npm_package_version && git push origin develop
